column4: I get mine at Border's books, but, this is Sept, and that was ISsue for March!  But, might be on Amazon.com, and They sell back issues! here is the URL: http://www.linux-magazine.com
Linner: The base install, plus the Desktop and Fileserver options, seemed to do all the work!
Both Debian, and Ubuntu, that I have installed this past week, about four times each, have an apparently identical install process!
